subject: Lacrosse
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares, 44, a math teacher in Mississauga, Ontario, and an uncle of the Islanders star, is the highest-scoring player in the history of indoor lacrosse.
snippet: John Tavares, 44, a math teacher in Mississauga, Ontario, and an uncle of the Islanders star, is the highest-scoring player in the history of indoor lacrosse.
